answer: W) CREATE NUCLEI HEAVIER THAN IRON

question: 23) Life Science – Multiple Choice Which of the following does NOT occur during prometaphase [pro- MEHTA-phase]? W) The nuclear membrane dissolves X) Chromatids [CROW-mah-tids] arrive at opposite cell poles Y) Kinetochores [kin-EHT-oh-cores] form as proteins attached to centromeres [SEN-troh-meers] Z) Microtubules [micro-TUBE-yules] attach to kinetochores
answer: X) CHROMATIDS ARRIVE AT OPPOSITE CELL POLES
